tool_description: This endpoint transcodes & compresses audio files like WAV and MP3 to AAC format (Which has the best compression quality for mobile). It can compress 100 times original files and 3-5 times compressed files. This endpoint is referenced as "A3" in our Postman collection. We provide very detailed documentation there. Please check our postman documentation for full info. There is also axios example in tutorials.
name: Audio Transcoder / Compression / Optimization (Download Url)
title: Audio Transcoder / Compression / Optimization (Download Url)

api_list.name: A3- Single AUDIO || Transcode Single File && Return Download Url
api_list.description:
- This endpoint only accepts one source and one target. If you pass multiple values, then it will fail.
- The code of this endpoint "A3" in our postman collection. You can find more details there. 
- Please check "C6" and "E6" if you want to pass multiple source and/or target.
- Please read the "introduction" section in the document for more info on our docs.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://audio-transcoder-compression-optimization-download-url.p.rapidapi.com/apifsp/transcoder/generate-download-link/audio"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "audio-transcoder-compression-optimization-download-url.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://audio-transcoder-compression-optimization-download-url.p.rapidapi.com/apifsp/transcoder/generate-download-link/audio"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "audio-transcoder-compression-optimization-download-url.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
